trans-unit.source: Returns the date in the PC's regional settings format

seg-source.mrk: Returns the date in the PC's regional settings format

target.mrk: Returns the date in the PC's regional settings format

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Input date in the format "YYYY/MM/DD[ HH:MM:SS]"

seg-source.mrk: Input date in the format "YYYY/MM/DD[ HH:MM:SS]"

target.mrk: Input date in the format "YYYY/MM/DD[ HH:MM:SS]"

trans-unit.source: one the following:

seg-source.mrk: one the following:

target.mrk: one the following:

trans-unit.source: 0 - Display a date and/or time. If there is a date part, display it as a short date.

seg-source.mrk: 0 - Display a date and/or time.
If there is a date part, display it as a short date.

target.mrk: 0 - Display a date and/or time.
If there is a date part, display it as a short date.

trans-unit.source: If there is a time part, display it as a long time. If present, both parts are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: If there is a time part, display it as a long time.
If present, both parts are displayed.

target.mrk: If there is a time part, display it as a long time.
If present, both parts are displayed.

trans-unit.source: 1 - Display a date using the long date format specified in your computer's regional settings.

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Display a date using the long date format specified in your computer's regional settings.

target.mrk: 1 - Display a date using the long date format specified in your computer's regional settings.

trans-unit.source: 2 - Display a date using the short date format specified in your computer's regional settings.

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Display a date using the short date format specified in your computer's regional settings.

target.mrk: 2 - Display a date using the short date format specified in your computer's regional settings.

trans-unit.source: 3 - Display a time using the time format specified in your computer's regional settings.

seg-source.mrk: 3 - Display a time using the time format specified in your computer's regional settings.

target.mrk: 3 - Display a time using the time format specified in your computer's regional settings.

trans-unit.source: 4 - Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm).

seg-source.mrk: 4 - Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm).

target.mrk: 4 - Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm).

trans-unit.source: 5 - Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm:ss).

seg-source.mrk: 5 - Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm:ss).

target.mrk: 5 - Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm:ss).

trans-unit.source: the date in proper format.

seg-source.mrk: the date in proper format.

target.mrk: the date in proper format.
